## Biography

Fynn is a statistician with a strong interest in environmental applications and was introduced to forestry through his summer job as a tree planter. He is currently studying harvested forest fuel structure and fire behaviour through LiDAR scanning and prescribed burns, to determine how harvesting can be utilized to mitigate wildfire risk. 

## Education

-   **University of Guelph**<br /> Bachelor of Mathematics and Statistics, 2020-2024
